price: (Qur’aan) woi yε anibue (Nwoma) de ma adasamma, na εsan yε kwan kyerε ne ahummͻborͻ de ma amanfoͻ a wͻgye die.
arabic: هَٰذَا بَصَٰٓئِرُ لِلنَّاسِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: hādhā baṣāiru lilnnāsi wahudan waraḥmatun liqawmin yūqinūna
